data.text: @Maxandcooper @BenBradleyTV @WGNNews We need to lock it all down know. Stay at home orders should commence.
@FlimFlamMan9 @Maxandcooper @BenBradleyTV @WGNNews Hey Buddy, don't you know grandma dies same day as you take off your mask.
@Maxandcooper @BenBradleyTV @WGNNews Just stop. Please follow the readily available data and evidence. NPI's and mitigations are ineffective. 2+ years of comparative data shows us this quote clearly.
@BenBradleyTV @WGNNews Try this again in two weeks after the masks go off...bet there will be a different story!
@BenBradleyTV @WGNNews Maybe report on the total number vaxxed, number of kids 5-12 and 12+ who are vaxxed as well as the number of kids under 5 who cannot be vaxxed yet.

@BenBradleyTV @WGNNews Thank mainstream news Ben!  Stay away from bat soup and you'll be fine.  Please don't report conspiracy theories like Pfizer and Moderna patenting the virus 3 years before the pandemic. Oh, and get boosted! 🤡 honk!
@BenBradleyTV @WGNNews Very good news. Thank you Ben. 🙂
